nodes.text: Comlinks, also known as communicators, were standard handheld communication devices, fit with microphones and receivers, and were used throughout the galaxy. The Galactic Empire employed the C1 personal comlink, manufactured by SoroSuub Corporation.

During the conflict between the First Order and the Resistance, Bazine Netal used a comlink to inform the First Order that BB-8 had been located at Maz Kanata's castle on Takodana. Comlinks during that era could also be fitted with holoprojectors.
